editorialNotes.standard: There’s a new king in town! Upgrade entire realms while battling an evil Dark King in the slick follow-up to Royal Match.
Streamlined squad play, smooth touch controls, and thrilling extractions bring this classic action franchise into the modern age.

ios.subtitle: Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!

editorialNotes.standard: Brew and serve espressos, lattes, and other caffeinated concoctions while building a bustling business in this charming coffee shop sim from the makers of Good Pizza, Great Pizza.

ios.subtitle: From Farming Town to Big City
Tap tiles in fun music game

editorialNotes.standard: We wouldn’t be surprised if Subway Surfers kept its spot near the top of the charts for decades to come. Its heart is the key to its stamina, revealed in loving details lavished on cities from Chicago to Shenzhen in its World Tours or in the lovable ruffians awarded in its frequent events. It’s a cinch to pick up, but we’re still finding new ways to master it years and miles later.

ios.subtitle: Grow to Eat! Snake Battle Game

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?
An Epic Build and Battle RPG

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone’s suspicious in Among Us!, a fascinating multiplayer game set aboard a damaged spaceship. Whether you’re a Crewmate making quick repairs or an Impostor taking out key systems (and unsuspecting players), each match is a riveting mystery. And a hilarious one, especially when smart accusations or sly misdirection sway who gets voted off the ship. It’s a test of wits anyone can enjoy.
editorialNotes.short: Customize your look with Halloween-themed hats.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property, and rake in profits.

editorialNotes.tagline: No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.
Be our guest and bring iconic Disney and Pixar scenes to life in this charming Tri Peaks solitaire game.
Tempt tigers! Sort flowers! This bite-size puzzle collection perfectly captures the creepy, quirky essence of the Rusty Lake games.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tons of fun on one screen

editorialNotes.standard: Danger is everywhere in this creepy post-apocalyptic MMO, where base-building meets bio-horror.

editorialNotes.standard: Quickly sift through colorful clutter to find identical items in this clever spin on match-3 puzzling.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Tidy your mind by aesthetically arranging stamps, pencils, stationery, and more in this relaxing puzzler.

ios.subtitle: Build and play your own team!

editorialNotes.standard: The ocean’s your preyground and you’ve gotta keep feeding in this deliciously goofy arcade romp. Rushing from meal to meal—fishes, birds, hapless beachgoers—keeps the pace exhilarating, and the gorgeous environments are a feast for your eyes. Meanwhile, random hazards (mines, pollution, bigger sharks) add a thrilling sense of danger—reminding you that you’re not the only predator in these waters.

ios.subtitle: Make dank memes and have fun!
